title: Gathbandhan
overview: They say love finds you in the strangest places, it's a promise, it's a souvenir which once given can never be forgotten. But what happens when this strange love comes tangled in complexities of laws, conflicting lives, opposing value systems, family tussles and a bond of lifetime. An edgy yet captivating love saga from the streets of Dashrath chawl in Mumbai, the show in a light-hearted manner will trace the journey of two contrasting personalities who under unusual circumstances are tied in a bond for a lifetime.
